trophies.trophyDetail: Congratulations on unlocking all trophies! With your skills, experience, and dedication to the trucking industry, you have become a legendary driver who is respected and admired by all. Your legacy as a top-performing driver will live on for generations to come.

You have just purchased your first truck, marking the beginning of your journey as a truck driver. From now on, you’ll be driving across the country, exploring new places, and delivering cargo to different destinations. The open road awaits you, and the possibilities are endless!

Congratulations! You have completed a mission in less than 5 minutes, proving that you are a skilled and efficient driver. Whether you’re racing against the clock or competing with other truckers, your speed and agility on the road are unmatched.

You have bought your first visual customization, and your truck now reflects your unique style and personality. With custom paint jobs, decals, and accessories, your ride will turn heads and make a statement everywhere you go.

By purchasing your first power upgrade, you have enhanced the performance of your truck, making it more powerful and reliable on the road. With upgrades to your engine, transmission, and other systems, your truck can handle any challenge that comes your way.

You have passed your first mission as a truck driver, proving that you have what it takes to deliver cargo safely and efficiently. Whether you’re hauling goods across the country or delivering essential supplies to a remote location, you’re a vital part of the trucking industry.

With 10 missions under your belt, you have proven yourself to be a seasoned driver who can handle any obstacle on the road. From navigating through traffic to dealing with unexpected detours, you’re a master of the open road.

By refilling fuel for the first time, you have learned the importance of keeping your truck fueled up and ready for the long haul. With careful planning and attention to detail, you’ll never run out of gas on the road.

Congratulations on earning your first $50,000 as a truck driver! By delivering cargo safely and efficiently, you’re making a valuable contribution to the economy and building a successful career in the trucking industry.

You have slept for the first time on the road, recognizing the importance of taking breaks and getting enough rest as a truck driver. With a good night’s sleep, you’ll be ready to tackle any challenge that comes your way.

By changing the color of your truck, you have added a personal touch to your ride and made it truly your own. With a custom paint job or decal, you’ll stand out on the road and make a statement wherever you go.
Congratulations on passing 50 missions as a truck driver! With your skills and experience, you’re a true master of the open road, able to handle any challenge that comes your way.
With 30 missions under your belt, you’re on your way to becoming a legend of the road. Whether you’re delivering goods across the country or exploring new places, the adventure never ends.

Player has traveled a distance of more than 1 km, you have demonstrated your ability to handle long drives and overcome any obstacle on the road. With patience, perseverance, and a steady hand on the wheel, you’ll go the distance and make every delivery a success.

Congratulations on earning your first $200,000 as a truck driver! With your hard work and dedication, you have achieved a major milestone in your career and have established yourself as a top-performing driver. Keep up the good work and continue to build your reputation as a reliable and skilled trucker.

Player has traveled a a distance of more than 5 km, you have proven that you’re not afraid to go above and beyond to get the job done. With your skills and determination, you’re a force to be reckoned with on the road.

Congratulations on purchasing 6 trucks! As a collector of fine vehicles, you have a diverse fleet at your disposal, each with its own unique features and capabilities. Whether you’re hauling heavy cargo or driving on rough terrain, you have the perfect truck for any job.

A testament to your unwavering resilience, you have surpassed three levels and your health(damage) must be 100% at the end of the missions after reaching level 15. As an unyielding trucker, you've showcased an unmatched combination of skill, caution, and precision. Your ability to navigate treacherous terrains, dodge hazards, and protect your cargo with unwavering vigilance is second to none.

With 70 missions under your belt, you have proven yourself to be a master of the road, able to handle any challenge that comes your way. From navigating through tricky terrain to delivering goods on time, you’re a true professional who can be counted on to get the job done.

Congratulations on passing all missions as a truck driver! By completing every challenge that comes your way, you have proven that you have what it takes to succeed in the trucking industry. Your skills and experience make you a valuable asset to any company, and your reputation as a top-performing driver is well-deserved.

Congratulations on earning your first $500,000 as a truck driver! With your hard work and dedication, you have achieved a major milestone in your career and have established yourself as a top-performing driver. Keep up the good work and continue to build your reputation as a reliable and skilled trucker.

By fully upgrading all parts of your trucks, you have transformed it into a powerful machine that can handle any challenge on the road. From the engine to the transmission to the tires, every part of your truck has been optimized for performance and reliability.

Congratulations on purchasing 10 trucks! As a truck tycoon, you have a fleet of vehicles at your disposal, each with its own unique features and capabilities. Whether you’re hauling goods across the country or exploring new territories, you have the perfect truck for every job.
